slides.script: I forgot my anniversary last year. I was so tired and foggy, it totally slipped my mind until my wife texted me from work, already crying. I felt like the worst husband ever.
slides.image_prompt: Tired man with his head in his hands sitting at a kitchen table, a wilted bouquet of flowers in the foreground, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Turns out, I wasn't alone. My best friend admitted he was struggling too - forgetting his kids' names, losing focus in meetings, feeling exhausted 24/7. We joked that we were getting old, but deep down, we were worried.
slides.image_prompt: Two middle-aged men having a serious conversation at a coffee shop, concerned expressions, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I started researching and discovered a shocking truth: toxins in our food, air, and water were sabotaging our energy and focus. The worst part? Most doctors don't even test for these toxins during routine checkups.
slides.image_prompt: A doctor's office with a patient looking confused as the doctor shrugs, toxin molecules floating in the foreground, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: That's when my sister, a naturopath, told me about an ancient detox tea used by Tibetan monks for centuries. She said it could flush out toxins and restore mental clarity in a matter of days. I was skeptical, but desperate.
slides.image_prompt: A serene Tibetan temple with monks drinking tea, sun rays illuminating the scene, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I did some digging and found studies from Harvard and Johns Hopkins showing how the tea's unique blend of matcha, moringa, and chlorella could supercharge detoxification and boost cognitive function. Even NASA had used it for astronauts. I was impressed.
slides.image_prompt: A collage of Harvard, Johns Hopkins, and NASA logos, with a green tea leaf in the center, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I ordered some and started drinking it daily. Day 3: I woke up feeling refreshed for the first time in years. Day 7: My brain fog lifted and I could focus for hours. Week 2: My wife said I was a new man - energetic, clear-headed, and more present than ever.
slides.image_prompt: A smiling man looking refreshed and energized, holding a steaming mug of green tea, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I shared some with my skeptical dad. A week later, he called me raving about how he'd kicked his afternoon nap habit and started playing golf again. My best friend's wife hugged me, saying I'd given her husband back. Even my sister was impressed by how fast it worked.
slides.image_prompt: A happy older man playing golf, a woman hugging the smiling best friend from earlier, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Now, I wake up excited to tackle the day. No more brain fog, no more forgotten anniversaries. I have the energy to be the husband, father, and friend I always wanted to be. And it's all thanks to this incredible tea.
slides.image_prompt: The man from earlier playing with his kids at a park, his wife smiling in the background, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: It's called PureLife Wellness Detox Green Tea Blend, and it's the most potent detox tea on the market. The monks' ancient wisdom, combined with cutting-edge science, makes it a powerhouse for restoring clarity and vitality.
slides.image_prompt: A box of PureLife Wellness Detox Green Tea Blend, with a Tibetan monk and a scientist shaking hands in the background, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: But here's the thing: PureLife only produces small batches to ensure maximum potency. Last month, they sold out in 48 hours. If you're struggling with fatigue and brain fog, don't wait. Give yourself and your loved ones the gift of a clearer, more energized you. Trust me, you won't regret it.
